response.overview: Five years after the horrible bloodbath at Camp Crystal Lake, new counselors roam the area, not sensing the ominous lurking presence that proves that the grisly legend is real.
response.title: Friday the 13th Part 2

titles.title: Venerdì 13: parte 2 - L'assassino ti siede accanto
Freitag der 13. Teil 2 - Jason kehrt zurück
Vendredi 13 - Chapitre 2: Le tueur du vendredi
